title: BBC Local Live: Leicestershire on Thursday 23 February 2017 - BBC News
summary: leicester fans 'fired at ' by spanish police .
amazon imam 'stopped in the street for selfies ' .
vardy goal gives city hope in sevilla tie .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: our live updates have now ended and will return tomorrow from 08:00 .

documents.title: east midlands weather update : winds to ease tonight
text: an amber warning for wind is valid until 20:00 , with rain and strong winds continuing to cause travel disruption .
wind and gusts will steadily ease over the course of this evening and overnight .
author: Alexandra Hamilton
BBC weather presenter

documents.title: breakingmurder arrest following death in cosby
text: a 53-year-old man has been arrested on sus of murder following the death of a man who was found at a house with serious injuries .
leicestershire police said they were called to the house in brooklands road , cosby , leicestershire , at 11:30 where they found the man inside .
he was taken to hospital where he subsequently died .
the force said `` scene preservation '' is currently in place along brooklands road , between manor road and andrew avenue , while investigations continue .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: city roads 'slowly reopening ' after storm
text: city centre roads are slowly reopening after # stormdoris .
st marg 's way is now open and st georges way partially .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: storm doris : fish bar chimney collapses
text: a chimney at plaza fish bar , london road has collapsed onto its roof .
please avoid walking underneath as it may be dangerous # stormdoris
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch : train staff pull branch off line
text: thanks to mike tansey for this video showing train staff pulling a felled tree off the track at barrow upon soar .
literally `` pulling together '' to keep britain moving !
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : storm doris across rutland
text: these have been sent in by georgie balmford - showing the impact of storm doris on oakham in rutland .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : tree falls in market harborough
text: nowhere across our region appears to have escaped the impact of storm doris - this tree has come down in market harborough .
thanks to hannah eva marie newlyn for getting in touch via facebook with it .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: storm doris : 'unsafe roofs ' force road closures
text: the inner ring road at st georges way in leicester is being closed until further notice because of an unsafe roof .
a side of sanvey gate is also being closed due to another unsafe roof .
both are likely to cause all sorts of huge traffic problems .
author: Sumeer Kalyani
BBC East Midlands Today reporter

documents.title: storm doris batters rutland water
text: i 've just been sent this of the wind and waves battering the sailing club 's jetty at rutland water .
thanks to james greenberry for braving the elements to take it .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: storm doris affecting university estate
text: you might need to find an alternative route to your university of leicester lecture/seminar
@ twitterid @ twitterid we have had to close the attenborough bridge between the seminar block and the tower .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: storm doris rips roof from scout hut
text: thanks to uinsean paddy giolla bháin for getting in touch via facebook with this pic of storm doris damage from sapcote .
that pile of what looks like building rubbish is actually from the scout hut roof .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tigers name side for quins test
text: here is the leicester tigers team in full ahead of the game at harlequins tomorrow night .
author: BBC Leicester Sport

documents.title: why the name storm doris ?
text: i was a little baffled as to why today 's storm is called `` doris '' .
well , it seems `` doris '' was voted for by the public as part of the met office 's `` name our storms pilot scheme '' - which helped compile the list of storm names for 2016 to 2017 .
very straight-forward !
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : rainbow in loughborough
text: thanks to claire michelle kasher for sending in this excellent of a rainbow earlier this morning over ashby road in loughborough .
i wonder who found the pot of gold ?
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: storm doris : part of bank frontage pulled off
text: storm doris : part of bank frontage pulled off
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: storm doris causing problems across city
text: east midlands today 's cameras have been braving storm doris and found this billboard that has been pulled down on vaughan way in leicester .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: storm doris grounds air ambulance
text: our helicopters are not flying at the moment because of high winds but we 're still able to save lives in our critical care car # stormdoris
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tigers ring the changes for quins test
text: lachlan mccaffrey ( and peter betham return to the leicester tigers team for tomorrow night 's premiership game away to harlequins .

there are also changes in the front row , with starts for ellis genge , george mcguigan and greg bateman , while harry wells is brought in for his first start in the premiership this season in the second row .
author: Martin Ballard
BBC Radio Leicester sports reporter

documents.title: car collides with front of tanning salon
text: this image shows the car that crashed into a tanning salon on narborough road in leicester last night .
leicestershire police said there were no injuries but the driver was in shock following the collision at around 20:50 on wednesday .
the shop was boarded up and the area was cleared by 22:30 , the force added .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: recycling centre shut
text: that unwanted copy of reader 's digest has had an unexpected ( albeit only temporary ) reprieve
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: storm doris : recycling centre closed
text: due to # stormdoris conditions , we 've shut our gypsum close and freemens common # recycling centres until further notice # serviceupdates
do n't panic it 's only wind
yep .
we know

documents.title: storm doris : fallen tree blocking road
text: cort crescent is blocked by fallen tree be extra careful today , stay safe !
@ twitterid @ twitterid
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: storm doris : 'large tree in road '
text: 11:00 -traffic update : a46 north bound -south of the six hills area .
large tree in the road .
please find an alternative route if possible .

documents.title: leicester supporters 'fired at ' by spanish police
text: leicester city fans have told the bbc they were attacked by spanish police , who reportedly fired rubber balls at them following last night 's game in seville .
one fan said he saw a fellow supporter hit three times by the rubber balls while waiting for his dad .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'amazon imam ' pleased by response to ad
text: mr hassam is even set to meet the queen when she visits leicester in april .
since the ad was released in the uk in november to promote the amazon prime delivery service , it has been viewed millions of times around the world .
mr hassam , principal of the muslim school , in oadby , said he was pleased with its positive message , which promotes friendship between muslims and christians .
author: Rahila Bano
BBC Asian Network

documents.title: amazon 'kneepad ad ' imam is rising star
text: a leicestershire man who played an imam in a popular christmas advert has been asked to work with the government to promote harmony between islam and other faiths .
in the amazon commercial , zubeir hassam ( right ) and priest gary bradley buy each other kneepads to help with the discomfort of kneeling while praying .
mr hassam said it had turned him into a celebrity , with people stopping him in the street for selfies .
author: Rahilo Bano
BBC Asian Network

documents.title: play area closed over storm doris concerns
text: you have my permission to stick a dvd or vhs on instead , kids .
we 've closed the play area in queen 's park , # loughborough due to high winds from # stormdoris - we 'll let you know when it 's re-opened .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tigers forward on bench for six nations clash
text: leicester tigers prop michele rizzo has been named on the bench for italy 's six nations game with england at twickenham on sunday .
we should find out tomorrow whether rizzo 's tigers team-mates dan cole and ben youngs will start for england .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: market cancelled by storm doris
text: as well as the travel problems caused by storm doris , loughborough market has been cancelled because of the resultant weather conditions .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

all to play for thank you to all the amazing @ twitterid fans for your support .
# ucl # lcfc

just like mufc players to get lvg the sack just after winning the fa cup you hypocrite !
@ twitterid @ twitterid u were nobodys b4 him , he made u all , dont deserve to play for @ twitterid dont deserve 2b footballers at all .

heading for championship .

documents.title: your photos : february across leicestershire
text: despite all the talk of storm doris - it looks a positively balmy start to the day in coalville .
thanks to bbc weather watcher pall of nell for sending in the
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: watch : east midlands weather outlook
text: here is your east midlands weather forecast , including the all-important information about storm doris
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: neville : 'massive , massive difference ' between sides
text: former manchester united and england defender phil neville , who was in seville for the bbc , has given his reaction to leicester 's performance .
`` i think now once the dust is settling there is a little bit of realism , '' he said .
`` they [ leicester ] did go toe-to-toe for periods but in terms of class , there was a massive , massive difference . ''
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your comments : city lose in spain
text: city fans have been in touch via the bbc leicester facebook page to react to last night 's result in seville .
ajay ashok writes : `` yeah a very good result for leicester .
they were more confident after vardy 's goal .
they need to score early and park the bus in the reverse fixture .
sevilla will live to rue their misses . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: schmeichel : 'anything can happen ' in second leg
text: leicester goalkeeper kasper schmeichel , who saved a first-half penalty , said the foxes have hope ahead of the second leg on 14 march .
`` going back to the king power stadium , anything can happen , '' the danish international told bt sport .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: vardy 's late strike gives foxes hope
text: leicester city 's hopes of reaching the last eight of the champions league were given hope thanks to jamie vardy 's goal in their 2-1 defeat to sevilla .
a lifeline ?
we 'll know how valuable that goal is in about three weeks
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live

documents.title: good morning : welcome to today 's live updates
text: good morning and welcome along to thursday across leicestershire .
i 'll be with you today with the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
if you would like to share your and/or stories , then please get in touch via facebook , twitter or email .
author: Calum McKenzie
BBC Local Live
